leads.lead_text: Leaves to 9 mm wide, margins recurved to revolute, projections on upper surface simple, short (to c. 0.3 mm long), lower surface sometimes with scattered long hairs overtopping underlying hair; standard petal with basal yellow flare

Leaves to 4 mm wide, margins strongly revolute, projections on upper leaf surface simple or folked, long (c. 0.5 mm long), lower surface often with relatively dense long hairs overtopping the underlying  hair; standard entirely purple
